settings.paragraph:
With this SIPP (spray in place pipelining) technology, application is easy and can be done quickly.

With the fast-set, spray applied, two component polyurea and expoxy resins, and no reinstatements, services can be promptly restored to the residential, commercial or industrial property.

settings.paragraph1: The Cyclone chain cutters are offered with 3/8", 5/16" and 1/4" cables and bring incredible performances and ruggedness at an unmatchable price point.

settings.paragraph: The powerful pan-and-tilt cameras offered by CustomEyes Cameras are ruggedized. affortable and allow more plumbers to take advantage of this powerful technology.

settings.paragraph1: The USB-USA nozzles, powered by their unique fluid mechanics within the nozzles help you get your hard jobs done right and keep on working job after job, saving you valuable time and money.

settings.paragraph:
Vetter Pipe Sealing bags are the optimum solution when quick and reliable sealing of drainage is required. A big advantage of the sealing bags are their freely selectable contact pressure(on the pipe wall): from 0.5 bar to 2.5 bar/7.25 psi to 36.25 psi.

The areas of operation are, among others:
settings.list-tem1: Sealing off sewer pipelines during repair or maintenance work
settings.list-tem2: Avoiding sewage backflow at the source location during pipe bursts, flooding, sewer inspection, sewer cleaning, repair and maintenance work

settings.paragraph1: MwStop¬Æ can be installed in virtually any pipe, even retrospectively, in just a few minutes and provides immediate effective protection against flooding, foreign bodies and annoying odours.
settings.paragraph2: The wide MwStop¬Æ range ensures that the right MwStop¬Æ model is available for every application, whether it is for backwater protection of the sewer system, for use in rainwater pipes or for preventing odour formation in mixed sewers.

settings.button_label_6: Contacts us today to learn how we can help you get back up and running faster than ever before !

settings.paragraph1: IPP Solutions Canada was founded with the plumber in mind. We offer a wide range of drain cameras, chain cutters and cleaning nozzles as well as our exclusive and affordable Spray-In-Place Pipe (SIPP) technology offered by the PipeCaster Pro.

settings.button_label_2: "Supplier of pipe inspection cameras, high pressure cleaning nozzles and a membrane spray liner solution that I've come to know this year and is already proving itself in terms of customer service and quick response."
